commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yay! Woohoo! I did it! The event's a huge success, isn't it? I'm totally fired up!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's a huge success! Well done, Ai!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yay! High five! It was so good! All of my feelings really made their way straight into everyone! I could tell by the great expressions on everyone's faces!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I've finally become one with everyone... Aww!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But I was the happiest person around today, without a doubt! You know why? Because everyone was wearing Ai Pals T-shirts, and...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: ...HEEEEEY! You're wearing an Ai Pals T-shirt, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is pretty neat, huh? I got it from Misato.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Huh? Why was she handing out T-shirts?

commands.speaker: Misato
commands.line: *Chuckle* Well, because I'm on the managing side of the Ai Pals group.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Wha?! Misato?! Huh? W-Wait a second. Really? You?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Why? Ack, I can't keep up with all of this! My mind is all puzzled, muddled, and befuddled!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, Misato is one of the managers of the Ai Pals group, which is why she organized the surprise today...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What, what, whaaaaaat?! When did all of this happen?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Gasp* Misato! Is that why you asked me to call Prez over the other day? To plan this?

commands.speaker: Misato
commands.line: As sharp as ever, Ai. That's right. You trust the club president so much that I figured I'd piggyback.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Aww! Everyone's doing secret things behind my back! Not fair!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I wasn't expecting her to have a T-shirt for me as well, though. I guess that's your big sister for you.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You, Misato, and everyone kept this a secret from me.

commands.select_args: ||But it made you happy, didn't it?|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you mad?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Of course I'm not mad! I've been swept off by this storm of deep emotions! *Wail* I love you both!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But it made you happy, didn't it?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ugh, I'm so frustrated, but...I'm totally happy! Give me a T-shirt too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All of the Ai Pals succeeded in surprising you, but your surprise song packed with emotion was also a huge success.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Giggle* These kinds of performances aren't bad either. The kind where I can show someone just how much I care and get those feelings back too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What are you saying, Ai? I've always felt that way about your songs and dances.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Wait... What?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You always sing and dance to show your gratitude and put on a fun show for everyone who supports you, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I feel like you're always giving the gift of happiness to the people you cherish when you're on stage, just like when you serve the customers at your restaurant.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Do you really think so?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But if that's true, then I'm super, suuuuuuper happy. I want the people who come to watch me to know that I'm grateful, I love them, and I want them to have fun!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So I actually am getting my message across!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You sure are. But let's bring more smiles to even more people with your Ai powers!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: More? Can I really do that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course you can! You're Ai, after all!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You really believe that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup. And not just me, but Misato and all of your Ai Pals feel the same way, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Because we've all had your happy powers sprinkled all over us! As an actual recipient, my words carry more weight to them, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: *Laugh* There's really no going against you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know, right?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Thanks! Your words gave me a ton of confidence! I'll do my best to deliver smiles to everyone's faces! I'm counting on your continued support, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! Let's give it all we've got, together!
